name: Giant Air Funnel
description: Technique to create a cannon for big projectiles.

name: Ultra Lightningbending
description: Manipulate lightning by separating the yin and yang soul.

name: Enhanced Shozin Comet
description: Formerly known as the very Great Comet. A celestial object that passes close to the Earth every one thousand years, just skimming the surface of the upper atmosphere.

name: Justice Trial
description: Aang entered the Avatar State and trapped Yakone in a mound of earth, allowing him to get close enough to take Yakone's bending away.

name: Power Granted
description: A lion turtle grants a hunter the power to control elements.
